import React from "react"; import "./CampaignCard.css"; const SingleCard = (props) => { return (

{props.ngo}

{props.email}

{props.phone}

{" "} Mission :

{props.objective}

{" "} Minimum Acceptable Donation :

{props.minimum} ETH

{" "} Target Amount :

{props.target} ETH

{" "} MetaMask Wallet Address :

{props.wallet}
); }; export default SingleCard;
